description: Numbers of terms in expressions for coefficients of Euler-Lagrange tensors in terms of Riemann-Christoffel curvature tensor and two of its contractions (viz., the Ricci curvature tensor and the Riemann curvature scalar) for n-dimensional differentiable manifolds having a general linear connection.
comments: The six known terms of this sequence coincide with the first six terms of A167551. - _Johannes W. Meijer_, Nov 12 2009
links: C. C. Briggs, A General Expression for the Quintic Lovelock Tensor, arXiv:gr-qc/9607033, 1996-1997.
C. C. Briggs, A General Expression for the Quartic Lovelock Tensor, arXiv:gr-qc/9703074, 1997.
author: C. C. Briggs (ccb104(AT)vm.cac.psu.edu)
